  <script>
   (function() {
					var hbspt = window.hbspt = window.hbspt || {};
					hbspt.forms = hbspt.forms || {};
					hbspt._wpFormsQueue = [];
					hbspt.enqueueForm = function(formDef) {
						if (hbspt.forms && hbspt.forms.create) {
							hbspt.forms.create(formDef);
						} else {
							hbspt._wpFormsQueue.push(formDef);
						}
					}
					if (!window.hbspt.forms.create) {
						Object.defineProperty(window.hbspt.forms, 'create', {
							configurable: true,
							get: function() {
								return hbspt._wpCreateForm;
							},
							set: function(value) {
								hbspt._wpCreateForm = value;
								while (hbspt._wpFormsQueue.length) {
									var formDef = hbspt._wpFormsQueue.shift();
									if (!document.currentScript) {
										var formScriptId = 'leadin-forms-v2-js';
										hubspot.utils.currentScript = document.getElementById(formScriptId);
									}
									hbspt._wpCreateForm.call(hbspt.forms, formDef);
								}
							},
						});
					}
				})();
  </script>

responses: {
success: "Success!",
error: "Error",
},

invalid: "This value is not valid.",
email_invalid: "The email value is invalid. Please check the email and try again.",

          <source data-src="https://static.vcita.com/wps-content/2020/05/services_compressed.mp4" type="video/mp4">
          </source>
         </video>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row block-footer">
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="section section-content-image content-image-section background-color-white hide-on-desktop hide-on-tablet bgalign-center bgsize-original bgrepeat-no-repeat bgattach-attach" id="content-image-6028f582b1c4f">
    <div class="site-width-container row pt-regular pb-regular ph-none mpt-none mpb-regular">
     <div class="row block-header">
     </div>
     <div class="row component-content columns-40_60 column-gutter-big vertical-align-center">
      <div class="col">
       <h2 class="section-text flexible_content.Text-text fs-text-big fw-bold est-none esb-small ta-left lh-normal mfs-text-big mest-none mesb-none mta-center">
        <a class="appointment" href="https://www.vcita.com/software/online_scheduling">
         Appointments
        </a>
       </h2>
       <p class="section-text flexible_content.Text-text fs-text-big fw-medium est-none esb-none ta-left lh-bigger mfs-text-big mest-none mesb-none mta-center">
        Get your services booked in a snap from your website, Facebook, or directly from Google search
       </p>
       <div class="button-row row align-center est-normal esb-normal">
        <a class="btn est-normal esb-none btn-size-smalllow btn-color-blue btn-style-hollow" data-buttontype="link" data-seo-classes="innerpage-navigation" href="https://www.vcita.com/software/online_scheduling">
         <span class="btn-text">
          Learn more
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col">

   <div class="section section-blurbs blurbs-section background-color-light-grey bgalign-center bgsize-original bgrepeat-no-repeat bgattach-attach" id="blurbs-5e4bf7cfc7ec5">
    <div class="site-width-container row blockalign-center blockpadding-none pt-regular pb-regular ph-none mpt-regular mpb-small">
     <div class="row block-header">
      <div class="section-title header fs-title-small fw-bold est-none esb-large ta-center lh-normal mfs-title-small mest-none mesb-none mta-center est-none mest-none esb-large mesb-none">
       Get inspired by someone just like you
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row component-content columns-3 column-gutter-normal row-gutter-small">
      <div class="column background-color-transparent shadow-none">
       <div class="col-9">
        <div class="row">
         <div class="col col-12 align-center malign-center">
          <div class="video-section shadow-regular col-12 mcol-12 align-auto self-radius-normal radius-normal backdrop-true full-bg video-click" data-display="full" id="blurbs-1">
           <iframe allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" class="section-video" controls="" data-clicksrc="https://player.vimeo.com/video/395178219?autoplay=1muted=1" data-height="360" data-width="640" height="auto">
           </iframe>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="blurb-content col-12 ta-center">
         <div class="section-title header fs-title-text-regular lh-normal fw-semibold ml-1 est-small esb-none est-small mest-small esb-none mesb-tiny">
          Janay A.
         </div>
         <p class="section-text block_repeater.desc-text fs-text-small lh-normal est-none esb-small">
          Eco Bridal
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="column background-color-transparent shadow-none">
       <div class="col-9">
        <div class="row">
         <div class="col col-12 align-center malign-center">
          <div class="video-section shadow-regular col-12 mcol-12 align-auto self-radius-normal radius-normal backdrop-true full-bg video-click" data-display="full" id="blurbs-2">
           <iframe allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" class="section-video" controls="" data-clicksrc="https://player.vimeo.com/video/395179821?autoplay=1muted=1" data-height="360" data-width="640" height="auto">
           </iframe>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="blurb-content col-12 ta-center">
         <div class="section-title header fs-title-text-regular lh-normal fw-semibold ml-1 est-small esb-none est-small mest-small esb-none mesb-tiny">
          Patrick Osei
         </div>
         <p class="section-text block_repeater.desc-text fs-text-small lh-normal est-none esb-small">
          Hot Money Studios
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="column background-color-transparent shadow-none">
       <div class="col-9">
        <div class="row">
         <div class="col col-12 align-center malign-center">
          <div class="video-section shadow-regular col-12 mcol-12 align-auto self-radius-normal radius-normal backdrop-true full-bg video-click" data-display="full" id="blurbs-3">
           <iframe allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" class="section-video" controls="" data-clicksrc="https://player.vimeo.com/video/395177708?autoplay=1muted=1" data-height="360" data-width="640" height="auto">

          </div>
         </div>

     <div class="row block-footer">
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="section section-content-image content-image-section background-color-green bgalign-center bgsize-original bgrepeat-no-repeat bgattach-attach" id="content-image-5e4d20d9c6783">
    <div class="site-width-container row pt-small pb-small ph-none mpt-regular mpb-regular">
     <div class="row block-header">
     </div>
     <div class="row component-content columns-40_60 column-gutter-normal vertical-align-center">
      <div class="col">
       <div class="section-title header fs-title-small fw-bold est-none esb-tiny ta-center lh-normal est-none esb-tiny">
        Better work days start here
       </div>
       <p class="section-text flexible_content.Text-text fs-text-regular fw-normal est-none esb-normal ta-center lh-normal">
        Curious what vcita can do for your business?
        <br/>
        Let a member of our team show you the ropes.
       </p>
       <div class="button-row row align-center est-none esb-none">
        <a class="btn est-none esb-none btn-size-medium btn-color-dark-blue" data-buttontype="link" data-seo-classes="schedule-a-demo-click-product-tour" href="https://live.vcita.com/site/vcita.sales/online-scheduling?service=289tixik1ymrp6hw&amp;vtm_cp=bookaproducttour" rel="nofollow">
         <span class="btn-text">
          Book a product tour
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col">
       <div class="col col-12 align-center malign-center">

  <script charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript">
   window.liveSiteAsyncInit = function() {
                            LiveSite.init({
                                id : 'vcita.sales',
                                activeEngage: false,
                                actionButtons: false
                            });
                        };
                        (function(d, s, id){
                            var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                p = (('https:' == d.location.protocol) ? 'https://' : 'http://'),
                                r = Math.floor(new Date().getTime() / 1000000);
                            if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
                            js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
                            js.src = p + "www.vcita.com/assets/livesite.js?" + r;
                            js.defer = true;
                            fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
                        }(document, 'script', 'livesite-jssdk'));
  </script>
